downloadTitle: Test Lab Guide: Demonstrate Forefront UAG SP1 RC DirectAccess Remote Management
downloadDescription: Step by step instructions in Test Lab Guide format on how to test UAG SP1 RC remote management of DirectAccess clients
detailsSection: DirectAccess is a new feature in the Windows® 7 and Windows Server® 2008 R2 operating systems that enables remote users to securely access intranet shared folders, Web sites, and applications without connecting to a virtual private network (VPN). Forefront UAG SP1 RC DirectAccess extends the benefits of Windows DirectAccess across your infrastructure by enhancing availability and scalability, as well as simplifying deployments and ongoing management. This Test Lab Guide contains step-by-step instructions for extending the Test Lab Guide: Demonstrate UAG SP1 RC DirectAccess  to demonstrate UAG SP1 RC DirectAccess remote management capabilities with a simulated Internet, intranet, and home network.
